name: OpenClaw Equipment
description: The package manager for AI agents. Browse tools, discover loadouts, equip your agent.

tools.name: search_packages
tools.description: Search the OpenClaw Equipment registry for tools and packages. Returns matching packages with name, description, category, and install command.

category.description: Filter by category: mcp-servers, dev-tools, ai-ml, web-api, productivity, openclaw-skills

tools.name: browse_loadouts
tools.description: Browse available Loadouts (curated tool bundles for agent roles). Returns loadout name, description, tool count, and category.

category.description: Filter by category: Productivity, Home, Finance, Development, Security

tools.name: get_loadout
tools.description: Get full details of a specific Loadout including all core tools, optional tools, workflows, and sample SOUL.md.

tools.name: get_agent_profile
tools.description: Get an agent's public profile including their loadout, abilities, tools, and stats.

tools.name: generate_agent_config
tools.description: Generate deployment files for a new agent based on a loadout. Returns SOUL.md, AGENTS.md, openclaw.json, and deploy script.
